member.name: SpatialAudioClientActivationParams
member.summary: Represents optional activation parameters for a spatial audio render stream. Pass this structure to when activating an interface.

member.name: SpatialAudioClientActivationParams.tracingContextId
member.summary: An app-defined context identifier, used for event logging.

summary.para: An identifier for the client app, used for event logging.
The major version number of the client app, used for event logging.
The first minor version number of the client app, used for event logging.
The second minor version number of the client app, used for event logging.
The third minor version number of the client app, used for event logging.
